title: How to Learn the Keyboard Shortcuts on Sherwood Dungeon

steps.headline: Press ‘enter’ on the keyboard to bring up the chat-bar.
Type /help to bring up the help screen.
Type /teleportX in the chat-bar to teleport to the 14 different islands in the game.
steps.description: Replace the X by the numbers 1-14 to quickly access the different islands. (E.g. Typing /teleport1 will take you to Sherwood Castle)

steps.headline: Type /joinX in the chat-bar to join the different chat rooms in the game.
steps.description: Replace the X by the numbers 1-300 to join the different chat rooms. Different chat rooms are used as clan ‘bases’ for different guilds. Ask around to find out the current guilds. (E.g. Typing /join30 will take you to chat room 30)

steps.headline: Type /levelX in the chat-bar to enter the different floors of the dungeon.
steps.description: Replace the X by the number of the floor you want to enter (Infinite number of floors). Remember that the level of your character affects what floor of the dungeon you are able to enter. (E.g. Typing /level20 will take you to floor 20 of the dungeon)

steps.headline: Type /who in the chat-bar to get a list on the screen of all the players online in that chat-room at that time.
Type /camera to enter the camera mode.
steps.description: This allows you to gain a birds-eye view of the whole island. Use the mouse to pull and push to change the viewing angle by clicking and dragging. You can also zoom in and out using the scroll wheel on the mouse. Press the ‘spacebar’ on the keyboard to exit this mode.

steps.headline: Type /design in order to enter the ‘design a room’ mode.
steps.description: This feature allows you to create your own rooms by using the inbuilt sandbox.

steps.headline: Type /logout to logout of your current session in the game.

text: Press ‘enter’ on the keyboard to bring up the chat-bar.  Type /help to bring up the help screen.  Type /teleportX in the chat-bar to teleport to the 14 different islands in the game. Replace the X by the numbers 1-14 to quickly access the different islands. (E.g. Typing /teleport1 will take you to Sherwood Castle) Type /joinX in the chat-bar to join the different chat rooms in the game. Replace the X by the numbers 1-300 to join the different chat rooms. Different chat rooms are used as clan ‘bases’ for different guilds. Ask around to find out the current guilds. (E.g. Typing /join30 will take you to chat room 30) Type /levelX in the chat-bar to enter the different floors of the dungeon. Replace the X by the number of the floor you want to enter (Infinite number of floors). Remember that the level of your character affects what floor of the dungeon you are able to enter. (E.g. Typing /level20 will take you to floor 20 of the dungeon) Type /who in the chat-bar to get a list on the screen of all the players online in that chat-room at that time.  Type /camera to enter the camera mode. This allows you to gain a birds-eye view of the whole island. Use the mouse to pull and push to change the viewing angle by clicking and dragging. You can also zoom in and out using the scroll wheel on the mouse. Press the ‘spacebar’ on the keyboard to exit this mode. Type /design in order to enter the ‘design a room’ mode. This feature allows you to create your own rooms by using the inbuilt sandbox. Type /logout to logout of your current session in the game.
